list.s: Bessie's numbers were Dying Gambler's Blues, Sing Sing Prison Blues , and one I had never heard called Black Mountain Blues , which has the imcomparable lines, Home in Black Mountain a chile' will smack yo' face; Home in Black Mountain a chile' will smack yo' face; Babies cry for liquor an' all the birds sing bass. and Goin' back to Black Mountain, me an' my razor an' my gun; Goin' back to Black Mountain, me an' my razor an my gun; Goin' cut him if he stan' still, goin' shoot him if he run.
